BEAR IN MIND.Defintion: to remember a piece of information when you are making a decision or thinking about a matter

BOOM.Defintion: an increase in something, or a time when something becomes more popular

BRANDY.Defintion: a strong alcoholic drink made from wine and sometimes flavoured with fruits

CRAZE.Defintion: an activity, object, or idea that is extremely popular, usually for a short time

DISPOSABLE INCOME.Defintion: the money that you can spend as you want and not the money that you spend on taxes, food, and other basic needs

DOMESTIC.Defintion: relating to a person's own country

EPIDEMIC.Defintion: the appearance of a particular disease in a large number of people at the same time

EXCEEDED.Defintion: to be greater than a number or amount, or to go past an allowed limit

FATE.Defintion: what happens to a particular person or thing, especially something final or negative, such as death or defeat

IMPOTENT.Defintion: if a man is impotent, he cannot have sex because his penis cannot become hard or stay hard

IMPURITIES.Defintion: the fact that a substance is dirty or lower in quality because it is mixed with another substance, or something that causes this

JUNIPER.Defintion: a small evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves) with sharp leaves and small purple fruits that are used in medicine and in making gin (= a type of strong alcoholic drink)

LEGISLATION.Defintion: a law or set of laws suggested by a government and made official by a parliament

PASS OUT.Defintion: to become unconscious for a short time, for example when ill, badly hurt, or drunk

PATRIOTIC.Defintion: showing love for your country and being proud of it

PERFECT STORM.Defintion: an extremely bad situation in which many bad things happen at the same time

RELIANCE.Defintion: the state of depending on or trusting in something or someone

RESURGENCE.Defintion: new increase of activity or interest in a particular subject or idea that had been forgotten for some time

SIPPING.Defintion: drinking, taking only a very small amount at a time

SPIRIT.Defintion: a strong alcoholic drink made from wine and sometimes flavoured with fruits

SPIRITS.Defintion: a strong alcoholic drink made from wine and sometimes flavoured with fruits

STERILE.Defintion: (of a living being) unable to produce young, or (of land) unable to produce plants or crops

STRANGLED.Defintion: to kill someone by pressing their throat so that they cannot breathe

TURBULENT.Defintion: involving a lot of sudden changes, arguments, or violence

TURPENTINE.Defintion: a strong acid with no colour

UNLICENSED.Defintion: not having a licence (= a document giving legal permission) to do something, for example to sell alcohol, or use or own something, for example a gun

WAKE-UP CALL.Defintion: If something that happens is a wake-up call, it should make you realise that you need to take action to change a situation
